content.raw:
Otherwise the task files would be hard to distinguish, eg:

```
➜  [Wed Jul 24 17:24:42 PDT 2019] vrx ls ~/worlds
shallow_test0.world   shallow_test11.world  shallow_test2.world  shallow_test4.world  shallow_test6.world  shallow_test8.world
shallow_test10.world  shallow_test1.world   shallow_test3.world  shallow_test5.world  shallow_test7.world  shallow_test9.world
```
content.html:
Otherwise the task files would be hard to distinguish, eg:

➜  [Wed Jul 24 17:24:42 PDT 2019] vrx ls ~/worlds
shallow_test0.world   shallow_test11.world  shallow_test2.world  shallow_test4.world  shallow_test6.world  shallow_test8.world
shallow_test10.world  shallow_test1.world   shallow_test3.world  shallow_test5.world  shallow_test7.world  shallow_test9.world
